casebody.data:
Randall SAUNDERS
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 25, 2016

Randall Saunders, self-represented, in support of the petition.

The petitioner Randall Saunders' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 137 Conn.App. 493, 48 A.3d 728 (2012), is denied.
